description: This file demonstrates the usage of the CohereEmbedder to generate embeddings for a sample text and initializes an AgentKnowledge object with a PgVector database connection, embedding details, and document count.

classes.name: AgentKnowledge
classes.description: Represents a knowledge base agent that interacts with a vector database and manages embeddings.

classes.name: PgVector
classes.description: Handles connection and operations with a PostgreSQL vector database.

methods.name: get_embedding
methods.description: Generates embedding vectors for a given input text using Cohere's embedding model.
